mapper.select:
SELECT vb.volunIdx as id, subject as title, TO_CHAR(volDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as startDay, TO_CHAR(volDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endDay, startTime, endTime FROM volun_bbs vb JOIN memnumperdate mn ON vb.volunIdx=mn.volunIdx WHERE (vb.serviceIdx = #{demander_seq} AND startDay>=#{start} AND startDay<=#{end})
ORDER BY startDay ASC, id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO volun_bbs(volunIdx, subject, content, savefileName, originalFileName, serviceIdx, startDay, endDay, startTime, endTime, place, progress, volunteer_type, volunDays, themeNum) VALUES(volun_bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceIdx}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{place}, '모집중', #{volunteer_type}, '금 토', #{themeNum})
INSERT INTO memNumPerDate(volDate, maxNum, volunIdx, volDateIdx) VALUES(#{eachDay}, #{eachDayValue}, volun_bbs_seq.CURRVAL, MEMNUMPERDATE_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
